title: Cell and Tissue Microscopy Core | Children's National Research and Innovation
description: This core supports investigators with research aimed at studying cellular and molecular processes through optical imaging. Learn more about our work.
cleaned_text: Core The Children's National Cell and Tissue Microscopy Core is located at the [Children's National Research Institute](/research). The core supports research aimed at studying the cellular and molecular processes through the use of optical imaging. The core offers access to: - Advanced microscopes - Hands-on training - Help with the experimental design - Technical support to optimally utilize the microscopes The core has an open-door policy and offers users 24/7 access to the available equipment. [Request core use](https://microscopy.childrensnational.org/fom/) and reserve the equipment you are trained on.
